document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Dying! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Wont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">somebody </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">bring </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">light </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Into </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">everlasting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">snow? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">"Jesus"! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Jesus </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Jesus </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">always </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">came </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Perhaps </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">does'nt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">House </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">Jesus, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">pass! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Somebody </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">run </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">great </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">gate </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Dollie's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">coming! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Wait! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">hear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">stair! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">wont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">hurt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Dollie's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Dying! Dying in the night!
